description: This file defines the RetrievalService class responsible for querying a vector store using embedding models. It handles embedding queries, searching for relevant chunks, and constructing a response with the top retrieved text chunks.

classes.name: RetrievalService
classes.description: A service class responsible for handling retrieval queries, embedding, and retrieving relevant chunks from a vector store.

methods.name: __init__(self)
methods.description: Initializes the RetrievalService instance with an embeddings client and a vector store instance.

methods.name: QueryResponse query(self, payload: QueryRequest)
methods.description: Asynchronously performs a query by embedding the query request, searching the vector store, and assembling the response with retrieved text chunks.

ctags.name: query
ctags.pattern: /^    async def query(self, payload: QueryRequest) -> QueryResponse:$/
